about_the_game:
1. 6v6v6, three teams compete, and there are neutral monsters to disrupt the situation, making the battle extremely fierce. The confrontation with many people puts higher requirements on the cooperation between teammates. It is difficult to survive alone. If you have good The equipment can be used to charge into the battle, defeat the opponent in a group, and then lick the bag. Those who are invincible can "pick up garbage" and then escape from the battlefield after collecting it.
2. A major innovation in the survival and gold-winning gameplay. We adopt a "dungeon-style" exploration mechanism. Each time you escape, you do not go back to the lobby directly, but you can choose whether to go to the next level. The next level is more difficult and also has better treasures. , but at the same time, the monsters and opponents will become stronger. You can choose to accept the situation and escape from the battlefield, or you can "gamble" to enter the next level to see if you can get rare artifacts by betting on some. What's even more exciting is that once If you die in combat, all items in your backpack will disappear.
3. Occupation and promotion mechanism. We have warriors, barbarians, priests, mages, archers, assassins, paladins and other professions. Different professions have different weapons and positioning. Players can not only play one profession, but all professions are beneficial to players. It is open and seamlessly switched, and the warehouse is also shared. Each profession can be promoted after level 20. After promotion, the appearance and abilities will be greatly improved, giving players an unparalleled development experience.
In addition, the graphics of our game are extremely beautiful. There are hundreds of weapons and equipment with different characteristics and usage skills. Most of the props and items in the scene can be destroyed and collected, which makes the game more immersive. We will add a lot of magic in the later stage, and may also add professions such as knights, spearmen, and druids. The early version does not have time to develop these professions for the time being, but they will be added later. What are you waiting for? Come and join this gold rush. Let’s travel!
